amendment.description: An amendment numbered 112 printed in Part A of House Report 119-199 to strike funding for the Taiwan Security Cooperation Initiative.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to strike funding for the Taiwan Security Cooperation Initiative.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Greene (GA) amendment (A011) Failed by recorded vote: 6 - 421 (Roll no. 205).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Greene (GA) amendment (A011) Failed by recorded vote: 6 - 421 (Roll no. 205).
